HASS ma ọ bụ HASS Petroleum bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa mmanụ nke nwere isi na Nairobi, Kenya.
Hass Petroleum tọrọ ntọala na 1997 site na ụmụnne abụọ, Abdirizak Ali Hassan na onye isi oche Abdinasir Ali Hassan
Onye isi oche ugbu a bụ Mohamud Salat, dabere na Nairobi
Abdinasir Ali Hassan bi ugbu a na UAE na London. Nzukọ ahụ wuru ụlọ ọrụ gas mbụ ya na Kisumu n'afọ 2002
Na Mee 2017, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere iwu ụlọ kachasị elu n'Africa
N'ọnwa Julaị 2017, a mara ọkwa na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ nke gọọmentị Oman zụrụ òkè 40.3% na Hass Petroleum. Na June 2018, Hass Petroleum meghere ọdụ ọrụ ọhụrụ n'okporo ụzọ Juja.
